name: Vegan Strawberry Lemonade Smoothie
description: Whether you're craving the vibe of a lazy summer's day or just a tangy, not-too-sweet smoothie, this slightly creamy take on strawberry lemonade will get you there.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup (2 ounces) fresh lemon juice, from 1 to 2 lemons
1/2 cup (4 3/4 ounces) strawberry soy yogurt or plain soy yogurt (see note)
1 pitted medjool date (if using plain soy yogurt, use 4 pitted dates)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in blender and blend until completely smooth. Divide between two glasses and serve cold.
